item.title: Commonwealth Security Secretariat
item.description: ß· This article is about a secretariat of the Vekllei Commonwealth Parliament Overview # OPSEC The Commonwealth Security Secretariat (OPSEC) is the mother organisation of the internal and external security organs of the Vekllei government. Its constitutional mission includes intelligence gathering, espionage, special policing, and state security. It is headed by the Secretary of Security, and reports directly to the Commonwealth Parliament. Commonwealth Military Command # The Commonwealth Military Command (CMC) is the unifying command organisation for the Crown Armed Forces, responsible ultimately for facilitating Commonwealth control of the armed forces.
